edge[tot] = z; Next[tot] = head[x]; head[x] = tot;}struct node{ int a, b, val;}t[N];bool cmp(node A, node B) { return A.val <= B.val;}int fa[N];inline int get(int x) { if(fa[x] == x)return x; return fa[x] = get(fa[x]);}void dfs(int x, int father) { d[x] = d[father] + 1; for(int i = 0; i <= 14; i++) { f[x][i + 1] = f[ f[x][i] ][i]; g[x][i + 1] = max(g[x][i], g[ f[x][i] ][i]); } for(int i = head[x]; i; i = Next[i]) { int y = ver[i], z = edge[i]; if(y == father)continue; f[y][0] = x; g[y][0] = z; dfs(y, x); }}int LCA(int x, int y) { int ans = 0; if(d[x] < d[y])swap(x, y); if(x == y)return ans; for(int i = 15; i >= 0; i--) { if(d[f[x][i]] >= d[y]) { ans = max(ans, g[x][i]); x = f[x][i]; if(x == y)return ans; } } for(int i = 15; i >= 0; i--) { if(f[x][i] != f[y][i]) { ans = max(ans, g[x][i]); ans = max(ans, g[y][i]); x = f[x][i]; y = f[y][i]; } } return max(ans, max(g[x][0], g[y][0]));}int main() { n = read(); m = read(); for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)fa[i] = i; for(int i = 1; i <= m; i++) { t[i].a = read(), t[i].b = read(), t[i].val = read(); } sort(t + 1, t + 1 + m, cmp); for(int i = 1; i <= m; i++) { int x = get(t[i].a), y = get(t[i].b); if(x == y)continue; fa[x] = y; add(t[i].a, t[i].b, t[i].val); add(t[i].b, t[i].a, t[i].val); } dfs(1, 0); int Q = read(); for(int i = 1; i <= Q; i++) { int x = read(), y = read(); printf("%d\n", LCA(x, y)); } return 0;}

posts.text: 12345678910111213141516171819202122232425262728#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring> #include<cmath>using namespace std;const int MAX_N = 1e6 + 10;inline int read() { int s = 0, w = 1; char ch = getchar(); while(ch < '0' || ch > '9'){if(ch == '-')w = -1; ch = getchar();} while(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')s = s * 10 + ch - '0', ch = getchar(); return s * w;}int n, x, y, ans;int main(){ freopen("road.in", "r", stdin); freopen("road.out", "w", stdout); n = read(); for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { x = read(); if(x > y)ans += x - y; swap(x, y); } printf("%d\n", ans); return 0;}

posts.text: dp求树的直径12345678910void dp(int x) { v[x] = 1; for(int i = head[x]; i; i = Next[i]) { int y = ver[i], z = edge[i]; if(v[y])continue; dp(y); ans = max(ans, d[x] + d[y] + z); d[x] = max(d[x], d[y] + z); }}

posts.text: 123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748#include<iostream>#include<cstdio>#include<cstring> #include<cmath>#include<algorithm>using namespace std;const int MAX_N = 1e6 + 10;inline int read() { int s = 0, w = 1; char ch = getchar(); while(ch < '0' || ch > '9'){if(ch == '-')w = -1; ch = getchar();} while(ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')s = s * 10 + ch - '0', ch = getchar(); return s * w;}int T, a[MAX_N], b[MAX_N], n, m;bool v[MAX_N];int main() { freopen("money.in", "r", stdin); freopen("money.out", "w", stdout); T = read(); while(T--) { int ans = 0; memset(a, 0 ,sizeof(a)); memset(b, 0 ,sizeof(b)); memset(v, 0 ,sizeof(v)); n = read(); for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++)a[i] = read(); sort(a + 1, a + 1 + n); if(a[1] == 1) { printf("1\n"); continue; } for(int i = 1; i <= n; i++) { if(v[a[i]])continue; v[a[i]] = 1; for(int j = 1; j + a[i] <= a[n]; j++) { if(!v[j])continue; v[a[i] + j] = 1; } ans++; } printf("%d\n", ans); } return 0;}
